entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Multibindings applied to BindableObject.BindingContext property do not work. #10792
  • [Android] Animation lag when we use framework translate to method. #10789
  • Is there a way to change Shell.TitleView Background color? #10788
  • [Bug] Scroll view inside the stack layout not scrolling. #10787
  • ScrollView inside StackLayout is not scrolling #10786
  • Path does not respect width and height #10784
    Backlog
  • [Android] WindowOvelay painting is not working with shell #10781
  • [Blazor] Evaluate how we deal with the encoding in the URLs we receive #10780
    .NET 8 Planning
  • WebView not displaying in iOS app #10777
  • Java.Lang.IllegalStateException: 'View with id -1: crc640ec207abc449b2ca.ShellPageContainer#onMeasure() did not set the measured dimension by calling setMeasuredDimension()' #10776
  • android target platform identifier is not recognized #10773
  • Cannot update WebView2 UserDataFolder in BlazorWebView for Windows Forms #10772

Closed

  • New MAUI Blazor project should not target IOS by default #10766
  • [iOS] White flashy background after splash screen in MAUI Blazor #10767
  • MAUI Blazor Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebView.Maui Dependency version error #10775
  • [Android] Multiple navigation bars appear for FlyoutPage (MAUI ver. 6.0.541) #10634
  • Changing properties on MauiIcon, MauiImage and MauiSplashScreen sometimes does not regenerate images #9803
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Tapping on entry field throws an NSInvalidArgumentException running on an iPhone device #10194
    6.0-sr7
  • Border doesn't redraw itself when properties changed on Windows #10138
    7.0
  • ControlTemplate breaks RadioButton functionality #10301
    Backlog
  • RadioButton template layout broken #10491
    7.0
  • VerticalScrollBarVisibility not working on Android #9489
    Backlog
  • Long Project Name breaks layout in new MAUI Blazor App #7231
    .NET 8 Planning

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix typos in code #10795
  • Update TODO comments for API changes that did not make it for .NET 7 #10794
  • Fix typos in comments/typos #10793
  • Fix more inline API docs #10785
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers from 7.0.0-preview1.22514.1 to 7.0.0-preview1.22518.1 #10783
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [Windows] Apply different brushes by state (Normal, PointerOver, etc) #10782
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️

Merged

  • Build the net6 templates in net7 #9758
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Windows] Detect StrokeDashArray Border collection changes #10145
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️, 7.0
  • [Housekeeping] Added more Frame samples to Core Gallery #10616
    platform/macOS 🍏, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮, control-frame
  • Allow * decompression during Arrange even when target size is smaller than desired size #10768
  • Fix VerticalScrollBarVisibility not working #10765
  • [Blazor] Close memory stream after copy #10769
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • Add Automated docs spellcheck via GitHub Actions #10774
    community ✨

Updated

  • Fix Switch Off Track Color - Fixes #10099 #10758
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-switch
  • Add Obsolete attribute to MessagingCenter #8765
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/perf 🏎️, .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Enable parallel builds back #10420
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Essentials] Fixes IPreferences DateTime handling #9974
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • Implement Keyboard on SearchBarHandler #9851
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • Fix shapes sizing and alignment #9607
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️
  • [iOS] Handle focus changes for UIButton #10614
  • Fix Secondary Tap Scenarios on Android #10619
  • Added Tag to map pin #10446
    community ✨
